duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze business processes, gaps in capabilities, and appropriate data sources to address capability gaps.
Consult with business end users to solve complex system issues through evaluation of business processes and industry standards.
Develop functional specifications for new system enhancements.
Recommend solutions and process changes to address complex system issues.
Effectively use complex analytical, interpretive, and problem-solving techniques.
Manage stakeholders' expectations and prioritize tasks effectively.

education_certification.credential: External BA certification (IIBA - AAC/CCBA/CBAP or CSPO from Scrum Alliance) as per project policy.
Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field (Master's preferred).
